name: The Worst Game Ever (ReadingReality)
description: Don't let the title fool you, this game is actually great, it's extra super-duper amazing, almost more than certainly the best game you will ever play in your life absolutely guaranteed! It has high speed dodging action that will definitely be fun after the first hour, no bugs at all ever, and only a very tiny little bit of lag, nothing game breaking! The controls are super easy to learn for new players as long as they have an extra hand or three,  and it even has a multiplayer mode if you want to play with someone that could theoretically be called an acquaintance! Come and play right now!
